directions: Slightly moisten rim of a large martini glass, and dip in course salt to rim the glass.
Combine tequila, orange liqueur, sweet and sour mix, orange juice, and ice in a shaker.  Shake vigorously, and strain into martini glass. Garnish with jalapeno-stuffed green olives.
ingredients: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger orange liqueur (Cointreau, Triple Sec or Grand Marnier)
title: Texatini
